duties_responsibilities.duty: Administer daily prescribed doses of radiation therapy.
Perform simulations and design treatment devices for immobilization and custom setup.
Assist with brachytherapy procedures and treatments.
Communicate pertinent information concerning patient care and treatment.
Document daily and cumulative dose data and other treatment information thoroughly and precisely.
Monitor patients' general status for changes and facilitate further care by the nursing staff and physicians as indicated.
Obtain portal images, verify agreement with planned port, and make necessary adjustments.
Maintain a neat and orderly work environment and treatment room.
Review electronic charts regularly for completion and inclusion of all necessary clinical information.
Perform QA checks and document any parameter or situation exceeding acceptable limits.
Attend departmental meetings and serve on departmental CQI committee.
Demonstrate competence to provide developmentally appropriate care/treatment to adolescent, adult, and geriatric patients.
Complete all hospital required testing and training for annual saf

education_certification.credential: Graduate of an accredited Radiation Therapy school
Registered by the ARRT or registry eligible
